title: How Do Hurricanes Form?
description: In the last couple of weeks, two big hurricanes have hit parts of the United States and Caribbean islands. In this episode we answer questions from kids who have been hearing the news and wondering: How do hurricanes form? Why do hurricanes strike Florida? Why do hurricanes have names? We speak with atmospheric scientist Shuyi Chen of the University of Washington.
itunes:subtitle: In the last couple of weeks, two big hurricanes have hit parts of the United States and Caribbean islands.
author: questions@butwhykids.org (Vermont Public)
